item.question:
showcase
[ˈʃoʊkeɪs]
item.answer:
【考法】vt.展示（优点）: to exhibit especially in an attractive or favorable aspect
【例】Restored films are being showcased this month at a festival in Paris. 本月的巴黎电影节将展映一些修复版的电影。
【近】 brandish, disport, exhibit, expose, flash, flaunt, parade, show off, trot out
【反】 conceal, hide, secrete 隐藏
